extension.name: Events Booking - AcyMailing
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin is used to add registrants to AcyMailing when they register for an event.

field.name: default_list_ids
field.label: Default Lists
field.description: Enter IDs of the lists which will be selected by default when you add new event, comma separated like 1,2

field.name: subscribe_newsletter_field
field.label: Subscribe Newsletter Field
field.description: Select the custom field which you allow registrants to choose to join newsletter. Should be a checkbox, select or radio field. If you don't select any field, registrants will always be subscribed to newsletter

field.name: add_group_members_to_newsletter
field.label: Add Group Members To Newsletter?
field.description: If set to Yes, group members will be subscribed to newsletter, too

field.name: connect_subscriber_to_joomla_user_account
field.label: Connect ACYMailing Subscriber To Joomla User Account
field.option: Both Billing Person and Group Members

field.name: remove_from_lists_when_registration_cancelled
field.label: Remove From Lists When Registration Cancelled

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend event submission form
